title: ILE X AFAIC
content:
Bay area bag makers ILE teamed up with AFAIC on a lightweight collection of riding staples…

As Far As I’m Concerned (AFAIC) is an experimental cycling team from the East Bay that operates at the intersection of cycling, creativity, and community. Over the past couple years we’ve partnered up to host various group rides in an effort to bring people together around our shared passions for cycling and adventure.

ILE x AFAIC includes premium reinterpretations of our Pilot Bar Bag, Seat Bag ALL MOUNTAIN, and Key Clip. The bags are made using a combination of Fog UX10 XPAC and Blaze Cordura, with MultiCam Alpine webbing accents and quick access stash pockets. The semi-translucent nature of UX10 results in a hazy window effect on the unlined panels of the bag.

The Key Clip features a unique 2-in-1 FIDLOCK magnetic mechanism. A quick-release pull tab allows you to detach the key chain component for ease of use, or transfer to the interior magnetic dock on the Pilot Bar Bag.

Available at Inside Line Equipment.

The post ILE X AFAIC appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
